page.title: 17HATTERSLEY 1
page.content: Transport:- The area has good bus services which link it with Glossop and Manchester. One or two of the services detour around the estate rejoining the main roads again. The British Railway's station is a new asset to the area, being constructed in only the last few years.This provides a link with Glossop and Manchester and offers much needed commuter facilities. Entertainment:- Two Public Houses serve the community, the Hustage and the Centuries (formerly the Centurian). The British Legion Club also resides on the estate.
